p: 1,8-Cineole (1.0 ± 0.0%) was the only oxygenated monoterpene detected in turmeric essential oil. In contrast, this fraction, with ten oxygenated monoterpenes identified, was qualitatively the main phytochemical group found in ginger essential oil. 1,8-Cineole (3.0 ± 0.1%), followed by geranial (3.2 ± 0.0%) and neral (2.1 ± 0.1%), were the main compounds ( Table 1).
